name: MarkdownDecodableAttributedStringKey
desc: A protocol that defines how an attribute key decodes a value that corresponds to Markdown syntax.

items.name: static func decodeMarkdown(from: Decoder) -> Self.Value
items.desc: Decodes a value from the provided decoder.

items.name: static var markdownName: String
items.desc: The Markdown name associated with an attributed string key.
